body:
Sorry, but I kinda need help with something. I'm thinking of donating for emerald but I'm only doing it if I can pretty much donate more from the $25. Like... I've already donated $25 so I'll have to only donate $25 to get it. 

If I have to donate $50 then I'm not doing it because it's not worth donating $25 and $50. 

Thanks :D

title: Donating Question

replies.body:
You can upgrade your rank by going to shop.acivus.net 
You only have to pay another $25 to get emerald rank
replies.body_tagged:
You can upgrade your rank by going to shop.acivus.net 
You only have to pay another $25 to get emerald rank

replies.body: Yeah I know that, But when I went into paypal it said amount due: $50 and I was like well okay then... I entered my name as TheDiamondGecko so id expect that it would register my name as already been donated.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I know that, But when I went into paypal it said amount due: $50 and I was like well okay then... I entered my name as TheDiamondGecko so id expect that it would register my name as already been donated.

replies.body: Strange, It does the same to me. It thinks that i'm gold rank. I believe that this is a bug.

replies.body: Yeah, I just don't want to pay more then I should have to that's all, I was hoping someone like a Sr Mod or Manager could help me out.

replies.body: TheDiamondGecko, if it says pay $50, then just pay for another gold and the i will take that away and give you Emerald. however, send me the proof that you have bought the gold (receipt).
